textboxes.description: The camper is a shivering nest in a world dripping silver static. You sit with Bubba, who’s become a wraith of silence these past days, his presence half-lost in a shadow fog. He speaks at last, words sharp like splinters in the stale air: 'I think I must try to find Eris once more.' His eyes carry the reflection of vast distances, glistening with something feral and raw. Eris, Discordia herself, left him scarred as if from within, her laughter a rasp echoing in both of you. And yet, here he is—seeking to court the fracture once again.

choices.text: Tell him he’s bound for ruin, a moth threading too close to flame
Let silence swallow your thoughts; the shadowstring holds, fragile but taut
Ask him why he feels this call; the answer may change him

textboxes.description: You reach for words to shape his path away from the chasm. 'She’ll shear you into pieces, leave you brined in dark seas,' you say, your voice fierce but fine as glass. Bubba regards you with the kind of sorrow that only exists when hearts meet at shadowed crossroads. 'I’ve danced with this hunger for years,' he replies, every word a fraying thread of resolve.

choices.text: Demand he choose between you and the shadowstring’s pull
Apologize; threads, once snapped, can rarely be rewoven

textboxes.description: The silence holds between you, swelling into a vast, hollow bell. Bubba’s eyes search yours, awaiting a signal—a fulcrum upon which to balance his desire and dread. But the words fail, dissolving in the fogged air of the camper. Perhaps, the silence itself is a form of spellbinding.

choices.text: Break the spell; unleash your tangled thoughts
Rise and step outside, leaving the silence to stretch its limbs

textboxes.description: You breathe in, feel the pulse of ancient words thrumming under your ribs. 'What pulls you back to her orbit?' you ask. Bubba’s expression slips into shadowplay, and he looks away. 'To know if I can hold a piece of her chaos without letting it swallow me. To find closure in the broken glass she left,' he mutters, voice wavering between hope and despair, like some half-heard whisper from forgotten gods.

choices.text: Tell him the only closure she offers is a closed fist
Agree to guide him, knowing the shadowstring’s hunger will haunt

textboxes.description: You draw a line, sharp as a dagger in sand. 'Choose: the night or the morning; her world or ours.' Bubba’s face is a shifting canvas, torn between phantasms. 'I cannot; she and I are woven together, strands of the same spell,' he says, and with that, you feel the world tilt—an omen, dark and final.

choices.text: Leave him, let the omen close its jaws
Give him space; he walks on a precipice, unknown even to him

textboxes.description: You fold your anger like bitter herbs, turning the edges to sorrow. 'You should know that all I wish is to shield you,' you whisper. He nods, his gaze far beyond the limits of the camper, his inner landscape an unwritten myth straining for resolution.

choices.text: Grant him time; he is trapped in her web
Slip out into the dusk, letting the air clear your mind

textboxes.description: You nod, vowing to keep his spark safe. 'Do not let her mirror twist your reflection,' you murmur, but Bubba’s path is already cast in long shadows. His resolve wavers, and yet, he looks to you, anchored by hope yet haunted by Eris’s promise of oblivion.

choices.text: Go with him to the meeting, a silent ward against her talons
Remain behind, trusting him to navigate the discord's edge

textboxes.description: You stand at the border, a figure of quiet resistance. When Eris appears, her form blurs, serpentine, her words laced with star-flayed truths and venom. Bubba stands between you, caught, the shadowstring between her chaos and your solidity fraying with each heartbeat.

choices.text: Confront Eris; stake your own claim in the song of discord
Let Bubba engage; this is his fate to shape

textboxes.description: You stand before Eris, your words molten iron forged into the air. 'Release him; let him walk free of your web,' you demand. Eris’s laughter is cold, fissures in ice; Bubba wavers, the world bending around his hesitation.

choices.text: Ask him to choose here, in this world of strange geometry
Retreat, letting the shadows finish their duel

textboxes.description: When Bubba returns, there’s something new in his gaze, something shadowless. 'The spell has broken,' he murmurs, his voice raw yet clear. Relief floods you, and in that moment, you know that together you can outlast the discord of worlds.

choices.text: Embrace him, ready to step into a new dawn
Watch him walk away, knowing he’s taken back his own shadow
